name: ETMONEY
profile:
ETMONEY, founded in 2016, is India’s only fully integrated mobile platform offering products across all sections of an user’s financial life - be it investments, insurance or borrowing. It is a one-stop platform for mutual fund investment, expense tracking, bill reminders, loan pass, gold deposit, insurance and much more. Through the app you can: 

Track & Manage your expenses, utility bills, existing SIPs & mutual funds portfolio 
Invest in Zero Commission Direct Mutual funds via Lumpsum & SIPs
Borrow money instantly via LoanPass & repay flexibly
Save tax by investing in top ELSS mutual funds & smart solutions
